Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an experience designed to elevate your daily routine. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your life. For this opportunity, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $85. I trust that you will find its value far exceeding this investment. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
